title: [Question]How to pass engineering chemistry if I haven't studied chemistry in 11th and 12th?
content: Is it hard to pass chemistry? Do we need complete knowledge of class 11th and 12th chemistry?

comments.body: Just study all the slides and notes properly; Maintain your notes during classes, attend labs properly and do all things related to it on time. If you do all these things you can easily get S grade
thank god I'm gonna join it as lateral entry so i skip all this bs üôèüèª
All this bs will be helpful to boost cg tho lol.It's quite light compared to cbse grade 12.
Its 80% mug up 20% logic. Just make sure you go through the slides, mug up everything you see (yes even diagrams) and practice pyq.
